testcase.classname: Feature for testing the Cart functionality.
testcase.name: Add to wish list, add to cart scenario : HappyPath
testcase.system-out: Given I add following products to my wish list..............................passed When I view my wishlist table...............................................passed Then I find total 4 selected items in my Wishlist...........................passed When I search for lowest price product......................................passed And I am able to add the lowest price item to my cart.......................passed Then I am able to verify the item in my cart................................passed
